description: An aspiring actress who joins up with a group of bandits on the planet Koam. When Amu meets Daba and Kyao, in an attempt to steal the L-Gaim, she falls in love with Daba and leaves the bandits to join them. She constantly fights with Leccee over Daba`s affections, despite the fact that he only rarely shows feelings for her. Amu doesn`t have much talent, but grows into a rebel leader over the course of the series; captaining the shuttle Turner and eventually becoming the pilot of the L-Gaim once the L-Gaim Mark II is developed.
name: Fanneria Amu
